title: Plat 1 Ranked 5s Mid Laner LFT
body:
Hello Summoners,

Currently looking for a position as a mid laner on a moderately high elo ranked 5s team.  

 - Main champs: {{champion:101}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:4}} 
 - Working to expland pool with {{champion:7}} {{champion:69}} 
 - Available most nights
 - IGN: Fraggin

I've also teamed with an incredibly good adc who would be interested in joining as well. 

 - IGN: Deathsticks

Add me in game or comment below if you're interested :)


Thanks!

replies.body:
Hey there, I realise you are a substantially higher  rank than myself (Plat 5) but I noticed your post containing a yourself, as a mid laner, your friend, as an adc, and there is also a plat 2 jungler looking for a team. 

This could be the making of a strong team. Here is a link to my post: 
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/smxWnEHv-gold-1-junglertopmid-lft

I'm currently patching so cannot talk in game but let me know what you think

Hey mate,

Add me in game and we can try put a team together. If that doesn't work out, my main team and I are looking for a top laner.

Here's a link to the post: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/775YEyLB-looking-for-plat-ranked-5s-top-laner
